DOC.brief_summary: Local anesthetic will be injected into both angles of the rectus sheath incision in an attempt to block sensory nerves in this area that cause the sensation of pain from lscs wound.
DOC.brief_title: Local Anesthetic Injection Into Both Angles of the Rectus Sheath Incision
DOC.criteria: patients booked for lscs primisection singleton pregnancy emergency cesarean section bleeding tendency hypersensitivity to local anesthetic
